statements: DELETE FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE storage_location = 'Site A';
DELETE FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE id = 1 AND storage_location = 'facility A';
DELETE FROM nuclear_waste_storage_facility WHERE disposal_method = 'incineration' AND waste_type = 'Plutonium';
DELETE FROM disposal_procedures WHERE id = 1 AND method = 'Incineration';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE waste_type = 'Biomedical' AND location = 'Laboratory';
DELETE FROM waste_types WHERE classification = 'Hazardous' AND hazard_level > 3;
DELETE FROM disposal_procedures WHERE facility_id = 201 AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM facilities WHERE capacity < 1000 AND location = 'City A';
